title: What would it take to remove the reservation system in India especially in the education sector? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well the administration can do few of the following things but all of them needs to be accepted & supported by public: Make the education free for all - this way everyone gets equal opportunity of educationThe basic education till Higher Secondary school can be provided by Kendriya Vidyalay alike schools which has same education infrastructure throughout the nation with the help of statesAfter Higher Secondary students can get universities based on their talent but still the education is free so no one gets to blame the economic conditions of individualPeople of so called higher society needs to accept the people from poor class of societyTalent based free education will build confidence in general category students as well as in the poor society students and will lead into healthy competitionAnd of course politicians as well as people needs to stop playing and supporting Caste & Religion based society systemThis all is possible only when people of the nation have the will of "Sabka Saath, Sabka Vikas".

The only solution to this is for the general class people to rise. Reservation is a policy of govt and can't be changed until and unless the general category people get into the parliament and change these flawed police's either making reservations completely on economical basis or either by completely abolishing it. But perhaps the big question is that will the general category people mostly involved in their own house hold chores financial problems and other burden rise for this fight. India is a great country and we all have great passionate leaders among us. All we need is just a spark & support from general category to unite all those who are against reservation and contest election. The purpose of writing this solution is my attempt to involve all those fed up from this flawed reservation policies to unite and fight against this injustice. Jai hind
